privacyPolicyInfo: This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data when using our website.
infoCollectionContent: We collect information you provide during registration, such as name, email, and other contact details.
howWeUseInfoContent: Your data is used to improve our services, communicate with you, and analyze website usage.
dataSecurityContent: We take measures to protect your personal data, but we cannot guarantee complete security.
